## Documentation Issue

Describe the documentation issue you've found or the improvement you'd like to suggest.

## Location

Where is the issue located?

- [ ] README.md
- [ ] Command-line help (`gokin --help`)
- [ ] Code comments
- [ ] Examples
- [ ] Other (please specify)

## Issue Type

- [ ] Spelling/Grammar error
- [ ] Unclear explanation
- [ ] Missing information
- [ ] Outdated information
- [ ] Missing example
- [ ] Other (please describe)

## Proposed Changes

Describe what should be added, removed, or changed in the documentation.

## Additional Context

Add any other context, screenshots, or specific examples about the documentation issue.
